about_the_game:
Moon 2999 is a RPG game about Units & resources management, single-player or co-op action missions game set in a lunar base and its nearby space environment.

Set in the year 2999, advancements in technology facilitate the colonization of the solar system, giving rise to multiple factions due to enduring political tensions. As the commander of a Luna base, your goal is to supervise and enhance base operations, explore space, and undertake a variety of missions, encompassing engagements with aliens, bounty hunting, factional conflicts, and PvP combat.

PVP combat


Aliens war on Mars


Bounty hunting


Moon2999 is a strategy game set in a future where humans have colonized most of the planets in the solar system. You are the commander of a human faction and you must manage your colony by constructing buildings, recruiting units and leading battles against other factions and Kragh aliens. You can construct a wide range of buildings, from command centers and military missions to production plants and research centers. Buildings can be upgraded to increase their power and efficiency. You can also recruit troops to protect your colony and attack enemies. There is a significant variety of units available, each with unique skills and different weapons. Battles take place in real time or turn-based and you have to use tactics and strategies to gain an advantage over your opponents. There are also RPG elements, you can upgrade your units by gaining experience on the battlefield.
